attributes.action: The peoples support for Simon Weston O.B.E as a candidate for Police and Crime Commissioner for South Wales
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people of the U.K. Wish to show our support for Simon Weston O.B.E to become Police and Crime Commisioner for South Wales.
We believe Simon would be ideal because of his outstanding track record of Integrity, courage, the ungrudging respect of his peers and the sheer will to get things done. Qualities that we believe are essential to the position of a Crime Commisioner.
